message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A little more for me to start since the value decreases faster for me each round.
Alice, let's be fair. We split it evenly.
Okay Bob, let's meet closer to the middle. This is a better deal for you than last round!
Alice, the value is decreasing rapidly.  I need a bit more than half to make it worthwhile.
Bob, we're running out of time! This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
